name: Dziedzictwo Gigantow
overview: Dziedzictwo Gigantów is an arcade platform game. The aim is to find an ancient magic artifact in the castle of Giants. The castle is inhabited by a variety of hostile creatures, such as zombies or ghosts. The player encounters a lot of pitfalls as well. The enemies and obstacles take some life energy. The main weapon of the player are the stones and axes. Traveling through the castle the player may find an extra energy, more weapons, gold objects and keys, required to open the doors.
